ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes Chris, and Catana of Soothing (34) stacks. BUT the question is, What about the CASSINDRA s CHANT of CLARITY song (songs) at 20 and 32 ? Are they the
ygData.messageBody:
Christopher M Andrews wrote:
> yeah, Chorus of Clarity stacks with CoReplenishment,

Yes Chris, and Catana of Soothing (34) stacks. BUT the question is,
What about the CASSINDRA's CHANT of CLARITY song (songs) at 20 and 32 ?
Are they the same ? Guess I need to check the vendors to see if there
even is a 32 clarity song around anymore :) Heheh, I love Bards so much
I have started a second with Much higher CHA than my first started 2
years ago and she is now at the age when these questions are first
coming to mind. Guess I know the answer to this one.

Thanks from Symphoni Bllue
Cazic Thule
